newsitem.title: USA: Chase completes expansion of mortgage-backed unit.
newsitem.headline: Chase completes expansion of mortgage-backed unit.

text.p: Chase Securities Inc said Kamal Gupta has joined the firm as a senior trader, completing a buildup of its mortgage-backed securities group.
Chase Securities, a unit of Chase Manhattan Corp, said Gupta, who had been with PaineWebber Group Inc, will be head trader for interest-only and principal-only securities.
Gupta will report to Ranjit Kripalani, head of the mortgage-backed securities group. In a statement, Kripalani said the buildup of the mortgage-backed trading operation is now complete.
He said over the last 18 months, Chase has hired 14 mortgage-backed traders and 12 sales people. The unit trades all agency and non-agency mortgage securities.
